description: Another chance to fill up your backlog of games? How about a couple of classics if you don't already own them. The Plaion: The Hits Humble Bundle has various Red Faction and Saints Row games.
title: Get a bunch of Saints Row and Red Faction in this Humble Bundle

description: Enshrouded is another recent big hit for Steam, as players continue to love their open-world crafting games and the good news is that the developers at Keen Games plan to get it working better on Steam Deck.
title: Steam Deck support is now on the roadmap for Enshrouded

description: Oh no, not another great looking update, I really have things to do. Alpha Strike has expanded the content in War Thunder once again and there's plenty to look forward to.
title: War Thunder's first major update for 2024 is here in Alpha Strike

description: Itching for a new tactical RPG with squad-based combat and interactions? Looks like Zoria: Age of Shattering could be your next game. It recently released along with Native Linux support.
title: Squad-based tactical RPG 'Zoria: Age of Shattering' released with Linux support

description: Trappist is a new colony-builder that space sci-fi fans should take a look at, giving you access to a whole solar system to travel around and colonize multiple planets and moons.
title: Explore a solar system in colony-builder Trappist

description: OBS Studio has a brand new release available with some fancy sounding features, making it still the absolute best and easiest way to record and livestream video on Linux.
title: OBS Studio 30.1 out now with AV1 support for VA-API, PipeWire Video Capture

description: Remote Play seems to be a constant problem for Valve to fix up on Steam / Steam Deck, as there's always something broken with it and the latest Steam Client Beta fixes it up again.
title: Valve fixes up Steam Remote Play - again

description: If you're in need of a new puzzle-adventure game like the classics, CLeM looks like a wonderful game to add to your library and it's Steam Deck Verified now too.
title: Wonderful puzzle-adventure CLeM is out now & Steam Deck Verified

description: New Star GP looks like it could be a lot of fun for motorsport fans! It just released on March 7th after a period in Early Access, and it is Steam Deck Verified.
title: Racing game New Star GP is out now and Steam Deck Verified
